heroSection.description: Empowering global investors with intelligent tools, diverse options, and real-time insights. Make informed decisions confidently in a user-friendly platform.

CHALLENGES_DATA.ChallengeDescription: Stockal approached us with a challenge that got the whole team excited - we were to be a part of this revolutionary platform’s journey by being a continuous development partner, which meant that we were not just building a one-time deliverable, but also going to work on upgrades and new features in the future.
BriefPoints: Create a reliable platform that got potential investors excited
Ensure payment gateways and other third-party integrations were seamless
Create a platform with ample scope for scalability and change
Continue to work on updates and upgrades

processSection.description: We started off the project by scheduling a series of workshops with the client to better understand the value they are contributing to the hospitality industry, as well as the unique offerings for the customers. As a result of this, we not only simplified our own planning process but also had a clearer picture of the MVP and ultimate product. This enabled us to create the best hotel management software. With a clear roadmap, we began work on Bloom’s deliverables. We leveraged a variety of tools and technology, such as Angular, Node, SQL, Redis and AWS S3 to develop the deliverables. As a team, we implemented an Agile workflow and ensured that the client could be a part of every stage of development. With this, we were able to implement feedback, redirect efforts, and brainstorm on the go without losing any time.

resultSection.title: The Result
resultSection.description: Primathon's team embraced the challenge with enthusiasm and a strong belief in the market need for the product. We leveraged technologies like React, Node, AWS, PostgreSQL, Spark, and AWS SQS to build a robust platform for our client. Our contributions included seamless data migration, a powerful CMS backend, new API development, transitioning to JavaScript, and streamlining monitoring processes. The client was highly satisfied, and we continue to support them with maintenance, updates, and upgrades.

otherServicesSection.title: Browse through other services that we provide

data.serviceDescription: We find the best Talent for you!
Not just Building, We also Manage your Products!
